comments.author: Yamagawa.5941
comments.body: Also got Tonics not coming up in my set, I’m guessing if it’s mystic forge linked in any way and soulbound, it’s bound to be omitted.

comments.author: Yamagawa.5941
comments.body:
I’m having trouble spotting the Philosopher’s Stone in the item database. Not a critical issue for me , but it keeps showing as a ‘mismatch’ for me as a result. Also on the list of item’s I’m not finding are the Crystal and the Eldrich Scroll – basically, Miyani’s soulbound gear. I’ve checked and rechecked the stone, and only glanced at the others (they could just be tpyos on my part).
//Yamagawa
